# k8s_infinispan_org_backup_v2alpha1 (Resource)

Backup is the Schema for the backups API

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "k8s_infinispan_org_backup_v2alpha1" "minimal" {
  metadata = {
    name = "test"
  }
}
```
